issue.title: [C++] Add Tutorial about Sending Tensor from C++ to Python
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3127](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3127). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I can add a short tutorial showing how to
1. Serialize a floating-point array in C++ into Tensor
1. Save the Tensor to Plasma
1. Access the Tensor in Python
   
   c.f. <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2481>
   
   cc @[pcmoritz](https://github.com/pcmoritz)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3127?focusedCommentId=16607767) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2481
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2481>
